txt.en:
'This is troubling news you bring me, [placeholder]. If what you say is true, then none of what has happened in Glâd Ereg is mere coincidence.

'It would seem that the Enemy is compelling all our foes against us in concert, not the least of which is Saruman the White. We must inform all of our allies and move to counter these threats at once.

'Journey south-east to the way-post of Echad Eregion and look for Faenhilith. She must know what we have learned.'

'Well met, friend. What news do you bring from Gwingris? Wood-trolls in Glâd Ereg?

'That is grave news indeed. We have seen more than our usual share of trouble lately, as well. It is a sign of these dark days, I fear.

'If you wish to aid us, speak with the other members of my company. We could use someone with your talents, I am sure.'
'There is nothing more you can do here. Journey south-east to Echad Eregion and speak with Faenhilith.'
It appears that Saruman, too, has begun to twist and create wood-trolls. This troubling news must be delivered throughout Eregion.
Talk to Faenhilith at Echad Eregion
Faenhilith is at Echad Eregion, south-east of Gwingris.\n\nLithuilas suggested that you journey to Echad Eregion and speak with Faenhilith.
